title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: When running the control example and resizing the window in the vertical direction, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash. This behavior is undesirable and needs to be fixed.
OB: When the window is resized in the vertical direction, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: Only the bottom edge of the outermost frames should be repainted while resizing the window.
SR:
1. Open the control example.
2. Resize the window in the vertical direction.
3. Observe the flashing of all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames.
